author: Anonymous Poet
title: Lecture 1
question:
During lecture we Dr.Carter said:
Write Racket epression that's equivalent to the following: 
; 2 * 3 + 7 = 13
the way the prof did was: (+ (* 2 3) 7) = 13
the way i did was: (+ 7 (* 2 3)) = 13
Are both ways correct? Or should I go with Dr.Carter's way.
student_answer:
Both ways are fine, but
Dr. Carter’s
expression matches the mathematical expression more closely.
